mapper.select: SELECT accounting_purchase_idx AS accountingPurchaseIdx , company_idx AS companyIdx , inventory_idx AS companyContract , company_contract_idx AS accountingPurchaseDate , accounting_purchase_date AS accountingPurchaseType , accounting_purchase_type AS accountingPurchaseType , accounting_purchase_unit_price AS accountingPurchaseUnitPrice , accounting_purchase_amount AS accountingPurchaseAmount , accounting_purchase_payment AS accountingPurchasePayment , accounting_purchase_sum AS accountingPurchaseSum , admin_username AS adminUsername , accounting_purchase_update AS accountingPurchaseUpdate FROM accounting_purchase
